name: Ashes O
description:
Hurry up, the world ends in 5 minutes!


A cryptic narration in a fast RPG where a sword swing can bring you 100+ levels.
Explore a strange universe as it nears its end in a minimalist style.

"Another one of my games that talks about infinite and absurd."

A unique game system where we place these stat points right in the middle of the action.


Carve your way through the final moments of this universe based on your abilities and power.
You have 5 minutes!


Early Access:

“Ashes O” is divided into chapters.
The game in early access is quite short, 4 hours for a first run.
It contains the prologue and the first 3 chapters.
Chapters will be added regularly until the final release of the game.
